text: Omarosa Sent to Hospital On'Celebrity Big Brother'Omarosa Sent to Hospital for Injury During'Celebrity Big Brother'Competition ( UPDATE ) Breaking News 5 : 45 PM PT - - CBS confirmed Omarosa received medical attention Friday night and Saturday for an asthma attack, and says the development will be addressed on Sunday night's broadcast. We're told her time away from the house was consistent with past houseguests who've had to leave for short - term medical care. 4 : 40 PM PT - - Omarosa is back in the house. The'CBB'live feeds returned and she's with the other houseguests. She was out due to her medical issue for about 19 hours. 11 : 15 AM PT - - Marissa just disclosed on the live feed that Omar
